article_title: State Farm, Blue Cross Partner To Sell Obamacare Policies

article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Bringing together two of the best-known brands in insurance, State Farm said it would partner with Blue Cross Blue Shield plans in five states to sell Blues brand individual medical policies when signup begins in November for private coverage under the Affordable Care Act. The relationship will marshal an army of [...]
